title: Chuck the Huckster II
author: VD
content_html:
Forget all of the various tax-and-spending issues. Forget all the Arkansas evidence that he’s Bush II redux. He’s openly pro-smoking ban. And now he’s being endorsed by the National Education Association. Any more questions?

The 16,000-member New Hampshire affiliate of the National Education Association has chosen to recommend to its members Hillary Clinton in the Democratic primary and Mike Huckabee in the Republican primary, according to a source within the state NEA.
content_text:
Forget all of the various tax-and-spending issues.  Forget all the Arkansas evidence that he’s Bush II redux.  He’s openly pro-smoking ban.  And now he’s
being endorsed by the National Education Association
.  Any more questions?
The 16,000-member New Hampshire affiliate of the National Education Association has chosen to recommend to its members Hillary Clinton in the Democratic primary and Mike Huckabee in the Republican primary, according to a source within the state NEA.
